headline.main: New York Man Gets Life in Prison After Rap Lyrics Used as Evidence
headline.print_headline: New York Man Gets Life in Prison After Rap Lyrics Used as Evidence

docs.snippet: An accused New York City gang member was sentenced to life in prison on Thursday for a slew of violent crimes, including three murders, after being convicted in a trial in which prosecutors used his graphic rap lyrics against him....
docs.lead_paragraph: An accused New York City gang member was sentenced to life in prison on Thursday for a slew of violent crimes, including three murders, after being convicted in a trial in which prosecutors used his graphic rap lyrics against him.

headline.main: Teardown of New Samsung Galaxy Smartphone Suggests Deeper Loss for Qualcomm
headline.print_headline: Teardown of New Samsung Galaxy Smartphone Suggests Deeper Loss for Qualcomm

docs.snippet: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd used more of its own chips to power the new Galaxy S6 smartphone than it did for the predecessor S5, according to an early teardown report, in a blow to U.S. chip supplier Qualcomm Inc....
docs.lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics Co Ltd used more of its own chips to power the new Galaxy S6 smartphone than it did for the predecessor S5, according to an early teardown report, in a blow to U.S. chip supplier Qualcomm Inc.

headline.main: Toyota to End Expansion Freeze, Invest $1.3 Billion in Two New Mexico, China Plants: Sources
headline.print_headline: Toyota to End Expansion Freeze, Invest $1.3 Billion in Two New Mexico, China Plants: Sources

docs.snippet: Japan's Toyota Motor Corp will spend about 150 billion yen ($1.3 billion) to build two new car plants in Mexico and China, two people familiar with plans said, ending a three-year freeze imposed after unchecked growth lumbered the world's biggest ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's Toyota Motor Corp will spend about 150 billion yen ($1.3 billion) to build two new car plants in Mexico and China, two people familiar with plans said, ending a three-year freeze imposed after unchecked growth lumbered the world's biggest auto maker with too many idle production lines.

headline.main: Brouwer's Shootout Goal Leads Capitals Past Canadiens 5-4
headline.print_headline: Brouwer's Shootout Goal Leads Capitals Past Canadiens 5-4

docs.snippet: Troy Brouwer scored the winner in the fourth round of the shootout, leading the Washington Capitals past the Montreal Canadiens 5-4 on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Troy Brouwer scored the winner in the fourth round of the shootout, leading the Washington Capitals past the Montreal Canadiens 5-4 on Thursday night.

docs.snippet: Dwayne Wade's left knee is only sore, nothing seriously damaged....

headline.main: Miller's Goal Gives Rangers 3-2 Win vs. Wild, Division Title
headline.print_headline: Miller's Goal Gives Rangers 3-2 Win vs. Wild, Division Title

docs.snippet: The New York Rangers clinched the Metropolitan Division title, naturally, on the road....

headline.main: Blues Handle Flames 4-1, Clinch Playoff Spot
headline.print_headline: Blues Handle Flames 4-1, Clinch Playoff Spot

docs.snippet: Jaden Schwartz had a goal and an assist and Jake Allen got light work in net for the St. Louis Blues, who ended a three-game home losing streak and clinched a playoff spot with a 4-1 victory over the Calgary Flames on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jaden Schwartz had a goal and an assist and Jake Allen got light work in net for the St. Louis Blues, who ended a three-game home losing streak and clinched a playoff spot with a 4-1 victory over the Calgary Flames on Thursday night.

headline.main: Napoli Homers, Santana Sharp as Red Sox Beat Twins 8-5
headline.print_headline: Napoli Homers, Santana Sharp as Red Sox Beat Twins 8-5

docs.snippet: Mike Napoli had a two-run homer in a seven-run sixth, and the Boston Red Sox beat Minnesota 8-5 on Thursday night after Twins starter Ervin Santana turned in five scoreless innings of one-hit ball....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli had a two-run homer in a seven-run sixth, and the Boston Red Sox beat Minnesota 8-5 on Thursday night after Twins starter Ervin Santana turned in five scoreless innings of one-hit ball.

headline.main: Some Big Name Fund Managers Lose Money in March as Rally Stalls
headline.print_headline: Some Big Name Fund Managers Lose Money in March as Rally Stalls

docs.snippet: Some of the world's most prominent hedge fund managers suffered losses last month as the U.S. stock market's rally stalled, but most are still boasting gains for the quarter....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the world's most prominent hedge fund managers suffered losses last month as the U.S. stock market's rally stalled, but most are still boasting gains for the quarter.

headline.main: Review: ‘Effie Gray’ Stars Dakota Fanning as a Rejected Wife
headline.print_headline: Art Critic Pans a Real Woman

docs.snippet: Written by Emma Thompson, this movie looks into the Victorian art critic John Ruskin’s famously unconsummated marriage....
docs.abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews film Effie Gray, directed by Richard Laxton.
docs.lead_paragraph: Written by Emma Thompson, this movie looks into the Victorian art critic John Ruskin’s famously unconsummated marriage.
